mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_account (payment_method_no, member_type, member_no, account_number, bank_no, expire_date, is_usual_account, process_user) VALUES (#{payment.paymentMethodNo}, #{payment.memberType}, #{payment.memberNo}, #{payment.accountNumber}, #{payment.bankNo}, #{payment.expireDate}, #{payment.isUsualAccount}, #{payment.processUser});
